title: Configures Tailwind CSS for an application or a buildable/publishable library.
description: Adds the Tailwind CSS configuration files for a given Vue project and installs, if needed, the packages required for Tailwind CSS to work.

project.description: The name of the project to add the Tailwind CSS setup for.
project.x-prompt: What project would you like to add the Tailwind CSS setup?

buildTarget.description: The name of the target used to build the project. This option is not needed in most cases.

skipFormat.description: Skips formatting the workspace after the generator completes.

component.description: Generate a component with tailwind styles.
